message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $20,000 reflects the product's true value, I understand your desire to find a middle ground.  Could you consider $17,000? I'm confident this offer represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $14,000. I'm really interested in the product and I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price.
